snippet: The discovery, which analysts think could be worth $15 billion to ENI, will help consolidate the Italian company’s position as one of the leaders in the hot new East Africa region.
abstract: Italian oil company Eni says it has made new natural gas discoveries in the waters off Mozambique, find that would help consolidate Eni's position as one of the leaders in the East Africa region.
lead_paragraph: The discovery, which analysts think could be worth $15 billion to ENI, will help consolidate the Italian company’s position as one of the leaders in the hot new East Africa region.

headline.main: Natural Gas Discovery Promises a Boon for Eni and Mozambique
headline.print_headline: Natural Gas Discovery Promises a Boon for Eni and Mozambique
